text: Ani jara ekhadya patnila apalya patikaduna upeksa ani durlaksa honyace bhaya asela tara tya doghanni apasata samajhota karuna ghenyata kahi va'ita nahi ani samajhota adhika cangala ahe ani lobha tara pratyeka manata samavista kela gela ahe ani jara tumhi upakara karala ani allahace bhaya rakhuna acarana angikarala tara allaha tumacya pratyeka karmala januna ahe
